Druga fudbalska dimenzija: Sjajan gest kapitena Evertona posle teške povrede Gomeša
03 Nov 2019, 21:13 by Zile
Nimalo prijatna situacija u Totenhemu pred dolazak u Beograd.
Ne samo zbog prokockane pobede protiv Evertona i prilike da pobede prvi put u gostima u Premijer ligi još od januara ove godine, već zbog atmosfere nakon teške povrede igrača „karamela“ Andrea Gomeša.
Portugalac je u duelu sa Orijeom i Sonom doživeo prelom noge zbog čega mu je odmah ukazana hitna medicinska pomoć na terenu, a zatim je odmah prebačen u bolnicu. Son je najpre dobio žuti karton, ali je sudija Martin Etkinson odluku preinačio u crveni kada je video težinu povrede portugalskog reprezentativca.
Svakako da je posle Gomeša najteže Korejcu, koji je odmah počeo da plače kada je video šta se dogodilo, a prema rečima Delea Alija ostao je uplakan u svlačionici još dugo po završetku meča.
U takvoj situaciji veliko je pitanje da li će Son uspeti da se oporavi na psihološkom planu i bude potpuno spreman za revanš sa crveno-belima koji je na programu već u sredu. Još ako se uzme u obzir da je, makar tako pišu engleski mediji, zbog bolesti pod znakom pitanja nastup Harija Kejna jasno je da bi neigranje tandema koji je Zvezdi pravio najviše problema u Londonu bio veliki udarac za Totenhem.
Posle utakmice menadžer Totenhema Maurisio Poketino otkrio je da je kapiten Evertona došao u svlačionicu londonskog kluba.
– Želim da zahvalim kapitenu Šejmusu Kolmenu koji je došao u svlačionicu i tešio Sona, rekao je Poketino.
Sam Kolmen je 2017. godine doživeo tešku povredu koja ga je od fudbala odvojila 10 meseci.

Second Soccer Dimension: Great Everton captain gesture after Gomes' severe injury
03 Nov 2019, 20:13 by Zile
Not a pleasant situation in Tottenham before coming to Belgrade.
Not only because of a knockout win against Everton and the opportunity to win their first away Premier League game since January this year, but because of the atmosphere after a serious injury to caramel player Andre Gomes.
The Portuguese, in a duel with Oriya and Son, suffered a fracture of his leg which prompted him to receive emergency medical care on the ground and was then rushed to hospital. Son was first booked, but referee Martin Etkinson reversed the decision to red when he saw the injury to the Portuguese national team.
Certainly after Gomes, it was hardest for the Korean, who immediately began to cry when he saw what happened, and according to Dele Ali, he remained crying in the locker room long after the match was over.
In such a situation, the big question is whether Son will be able to recover on a psychological plane and be fully prepared for a rematch with the Red and White on the program as early as Wednesday. Even if one considers that, even if the English media writes that, because of the illness being called into question, Harry Kane's performance makes it clear that not playing the tandem that caused the star the most problems in London would be a big blow for Tottenham.
After the match, Tottenham manager Maurisio Poketino revealed that the Everton captain had come to the London club locker room.
"I want to thank Capt. Seamus Coleman who came to the locker room and comforted Sona," said Poketino.
In 2017, Coleman himself suffered a serious injury that separated him from football for 10 months.
